full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MGON BRAM ZE'I GZUGS CAN GYI GTOR CHOG LAS BZHI LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES BSTAN BSRUNG CHEN PO LA MGON BRAM ZE'I GZUGS CAN GYI GTOR CHOG RJE BTZUN 'GA' ZHIG LA BRTEN NAS, ^SPU SHIN TU KHROS PA'I RNAM GYUR CAN, MNGON RTOGS SPYAN 'DREN BSHAGS PA BSKANG BA BSTOD PA 'PHRIN LAS BCOL BA DANG BCAS PA 'PHYER BDE BA'I PHYIR TSIGS BCAD DU BSGRIGS PA LAS BZHI LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ^MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG LA SBYANG BA MI DMAN ZHING NYAM SEMS CAN LA RTZA GCIG TU GTZON PA'I BYA GTANG, ^CHOS SDE CHEN PO BYAMS PA GLING GI SLOB CHUNG GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSOS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL ZHING, RANG NYID KYANG LHA CHEN 'DI NYID LA MCHOG TU DAD PAS NYE BAR BSKUL TE, YUL BYANG PHYOGS KYI MTHAR BCUR GZUGS SNYOMS LAS PA NGAG DBANG CHOS RGYA MTSO ZHES BGYI BAS, ^CHOS SDE CHEN PO DGON LUNG BYAMS PA GLING DU ^BSTAN BSRUNG MNYES PA'I DUS TSES DGE BAR RDZOGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGA' BA TSUL KHRIMS DAR RGYAS SO,)
